a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Monthly average surface temperatures by decade, World
The temperature of the air measured 2 meters above the ground, encompassing land, sea, and in-land water
Data source: Copernicus Climate Change Service (2023)
Note: The numbers 1 to 12 on the horizontal axis represent the months of the year, from 1 for January to 12 for December. Note that the
decadal average for 2020, comprising fewer than the typical 10 data points, may introduce greater uncertainty compared to other
